definition.en: xAPI profile for US-ELRR traffic simulation Level3 verbs
Indicates the learner received an accreditation by an authoritative source to perform a given job or task
Indicates the actor completed an activity to standard
Indicates the actor did not complete an activity to standard
Indicates the actor finished or concluded the activity normally
Indicates that the activity was started.
Indicates the actor has completed their session normally.
Indicates the actor attempted to start up an activity.
Indicates that the learning activity requirements were met by means other than completing the activity. A waived statement indicates the actor may skip the activity.
Indicates that the authority or activity provider determined the actor has fulfilled the criteria of the object or activity by means other than completing the activity
Indicates that the activity or session was abnormally terminated by a learner's action (or due to a system failure)
Indicates the actor completed assessments in a way that will cause a change in their authoritative learner state
Indicates the user performed a number of connected learning activities that should result in a change in their authoritative learner state
Indicates the actor's competency state needs to be updated based on completed content
Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (out of network) content in a social environment
Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (out of network) content
Indicates the learner has provided sufficient evidence to update the learner's measure of competence in a given competency
Indicates an OICS approved a change to a competency framework within the TLA that will affect the learners’ states
Indicates an authoritative source changed a learner's competency assertions based on a valid competency framework change
Indicates the learner meets all the requirements for a badge, but hasn't been awarded the badge yet
Indicates the OICS conferred a badge to the learner in the learner context extension
Indicates the authoritative source verified evidence of learning from a non-authoritative source as reliable data
Any generic activity an actor can interact with, that is not an assessment
An outline of the duties and requirements to perform these duties for a given position
Any generic exercise that assesses the user's level of competence.
A knowledge, skill, ability, or other object needed to perform in a given task
Any generic collection of activities and/or assessment activities
An online badge that is earned after achieving multiple related competencies
An authrotative statement that the recipient can perform a task
The learner's ID or other identifying indicator
The measure of a learner's acquisition of a competency according to the asserting authority
An array of the evidence to support an assertion
Indicates the actor attempted to start up an activity

scopeNote.en: Each ObjectID needs to map to a unique piece of meta-data for the launched activity

definition.en: Indicates the actor finished or concluded the activity normally

scopeNote.en: Each ObjectID needs to map to a unique piece of meta-data for the completed object

definition.en: Indicates the actor completed an activity to standard

scopeNote.en: Each ObjectID needs to map to a unique piece of meta-data for the passed activity

definition.en: Indicates the actor did not complete an activity to standard

scopeNote.en: Each ObjectID needs to map to a unique piece of meta-data for the failed activity

definition.en: Indicates that the activity was started.

scopeNote.en: Each ObjectID needs to map to a competency or other unique piece of meta-data

definition.en: Indicates that the AU session was abnormally terminated by a learner's action (or due to a system failure)

scopeNote.en: The duration property should, at a minimum, be set as the total session time, calculated as the time between the 'Launched' statement and the last statement (of any kind) issued by the AU. The LMS SHOULD also use other (LMS specific) methods (if available) to determine if the total session time was longer
Each ObjectID needs to map to a competency or other unique piece of meta-data

definition.en: Indicates the actor has completed their session normally

scopeNote.en: The duration property should, at a minimum, be set as the total session time, calculated as the time between the 'Launched' statement and the last statement (of any kind) issued by the AU. The LMS SHOULD also use other (LMS specific) methods (if available) to determine if the total session time was longer
Each ObjectID needs to map to a competency or other unique piece of meta-data

definition.en: Indicates that the learning activity requirements were met by means other than completing the activity. A waived statement is used to indicate that the activity may be skipped by the actor

scopeNote.en: Each ObjectID needs to map to a unique piece of meta-data for the recommended object

definition.en: Indicates the actor completed assessments in a way that will cause a change in their authoritative learner state

scopeNote.en: This should point a Competency Object
This should be a pointer to the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement

definition.en: Indicates the user performed several connected learning activities that should result in a change in their authoritative learner state

scopeNote.en: This should point a Competency Object
This should be a pointer to the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement

definition.en: Indicates the actor's competency state needs to be updated based on completed content changes in the Competency Framework

scopeNote.en: This should point a Competency Object
This should be a pointer to the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement

definition.en: Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (unscheduled) content in a social environment

scopeNote.en: This should point to metadata about an activity or activity cluster

definition.en: Indicates the learner interacted with "Wild" (out of network) content

scopeNote.en: This should point a Competency Object

definition.en: Indicates the learner has provided sufficient evidence to update the learner's measure of competence in a given competency

scopeNote.en: This should point a Competency Object
This should be the id of the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement

definition.en: Indicates an OICS approved a change to a competency framework within the TLA that will affect the learners’ states

scopeNote.en: This should point a Competency Object
This should be a pointer to the xAPI asserted statement was just validated

definition.en: Indicates an authoritative source changed a learner's competency assertions based on a valid competency framework change

scopeNote.en: This should point a Competency Object
This should be a pointer to the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement

definition.en: Indicates the learner meets all the requirements for a badge, but hasn't been awarded the badge yet

scopeNote.en: This should point to a badge
This should be a pointer to the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement

definition.en: Indicates the learner was accredited by an authoritative source to perform a given job or task

scopeNote.en: This should point to a job
This should be a pointer to the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement

definition.en: Indicates the authoritative source verified evidence of learning from a non-authoritative source as reliable data
Indicates the OICS conferred a badge to the learner in the learner context extension

scopeNote.en: This should point to a competency or a credential
This should be a pointer to the xAPI statement(s) that resulted in this statement
This should point to the learner who was conferred the competency or credential

definition.en: This pattern describes the sequence of statements sent over the an entire course registration.
